subject: AI & Agents
title: Session State: What to Store
description: Learn Session State: What to Store in one minute.

hook.text: Users hate repeating themselves. Agents forget unless you store state.

buildup.text: State is what the agent knows right now: choices, progress, and constraints.

discovery.text: Store only what youâ€™ll reuse: inputs, selected options, and tool results.

twist.text: Storing everything creates noise and privacy risk.

climax.text: Keep state structured (JSON) and reset it when the task changes.
